languages.text: "Боюсь, в этом случае служители культа предпочтут скрыться в нижних отсеках флагмана. Как они утверждают, "священная тропа, по которой во тьме ступает культ, призвала их вернуться к служению Неумирающему Императору". Все их тайны, мудрость, дары, что они бы могли предложить — все это может быть утрачено".

"My apologies, Lord Captain, but if the cultists are not granted an audience, they will go back to their secretive existence in the flagship's lower bays. According to them, 'the cult must return to the service of the Undying Emperor and tread the sacred path in darkness.' When they depart, they will take their gifts and secrets with them. This may be your only chance to hear what they have to offer."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, в этом случае служители культа предпочтут скрыться в нижних отсеках флагмана. Как они утверждают, "священная тропа, по которой во тьме ступает культ, призвала их вернуться к служению Неумирающему Императору". Все их тайны, мудрость, дары, что они бы могли предложить — все это может быть утрачено".

traits.locale_text: "I'm afraid in that case, the cultists would prefer to go into hiding in the flagship's lower bays. They claim that 'the sacred path their cult treads in the darkness has called upon them to return into the service of the Undying Emperor.' All their mysteries and wisdom, all the gifts they could offer would be lost."

"I'm afraid in that case, the cultists would prefer to go into hiding in the flagship's lower bays. They claim that 'the sacred path their cult treads in the darkness has called upon them to return into the service of the Undying Emperor.' All their mysteries and wisdom, all the gifts they could offer would be lost."

"My apologies, Lord Captain, but if the cultists are not granted an audience, they will go back to their secretive existence in the flagship's lower bays. According to them, 'the cult must return to the service of the Undying Emperor and tread the sacred path in darkness.' When they depart, they will take their gifts and secrets with them. This may be your only chance to hear what they have to offer."

This may be your only chance to hear what they have to offer."

According to them, 'the cult must return to the service of the Undying Emperor and tread the sacred path in darkness.' When they depart, they will take their gifts and secrets with them. This may be your only chance to hear what they have to offer."

According to them, 'the cult must return to the service of the Undying Emperor and tread the sacred path in darkness.' When they depart, they will take their gifts and secrets with them. This may be your only chance to hear what they have to offer."

languages.text: « Mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais si vous refusez de recevoir les cultistes, ils retourneront dans les baies inférieures du vaisseau amiral, où ils mènent une vie plutôt secrète. D'après eux, "le culte doit se remettre au service de l'Empereur Immortel et suivre la voie sacrée dans les ténèbres". Quand ils partiront, ils emporteront avec eux leurs présents... et leurs secrets. C'est peut-être votre seule chance de savoir ce qu'ils ont à offrir. »
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain, but if the cultists are not granted an audience, they will go back to their secretive existence in the flagship's lower bays. According to them, 'the cult must return to the service of the Undying Emperor and tread the sacred path in darkness.' When they depart, they will take their gifts and secrets with them. This may be your only chance to hear what they have to offer."

traits.locale_text: « Mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais si vous refusez de recevoir les cultistes, ils retourneront dans les baies inférieures du vaisseau amiral, où ils mènent une vie plutôt secrète. D'après eux, "le culte doit se remettre au service de l'Empereur Immortel et suivre la voie sacrée dans les ténèbres". Quand ils partiront, ils emporteront avec eux leurs présents... et leurs secrets. C'est peut-être votre seule chance de savoir ce qu'ils ont à offrir. »

languages.text: «Mis disculpas, Lord Capitán, pero, si los cultistas no obtienen su audiencia, volverán a su hermetismo en las bahías inferiores de la nave insignia. Según dicen, "el culto debe volver al servicio del Emperador Inmortal y recorrer la senda sagrada en la oscuridad". Cuando se marchen, se llevarán también sus dones y secretos. Tal vez sea su única oportunidad de escuchar lo que tienen que ofrecer».
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain, but if the cultists are not granted an audience, they will go back to their secretive existence in the flagship's lower bays. According to them, 'the cult must return to the service of the Undying Emperor and tread the sacred path in darkness.' When they depart, they will take their gifts and secrets with them. This may be your only chance to hear what they have to offer."

traits.locale_text: «Mis disculpas, Lord Capitán, pero, si los cultistas no obtienen su audiencia, volverán a su hermetismo en las bahías inferiores de la nave insignia. Según dicen, "el culto debe volver al servicio del Emperador Inmortal y recorrer la senda sagrada en la oscuridad". Cuando se marchen, se llevarán también sus dones y secretos. Tal vez sea su única oportunidad de escuchar lo que tienen que ofrecer».

languages.text: “我很抱歉，舰长大人，但如果您不打算见那些教派成员一面的话，他们就会重新回到底层甲板的秘密藏身处。根据他们的说法，他们的教派必须得回到甲板上，‘再次为不死之神服务，在黑暗中重归神圣之路’。如果他们离开，他们恐怕会把他们的礼物与秘密一起带走。如果您打算看看他们有什么东西要献给您，这恐怕就是最后的机会了。”
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain, but if the cultists are not granted an audience, they will go back to their secretive existence in the flagship's lower bays. According to them, 'the cult must return to the service of the Undying Emperor and tread the sacred path in darkness.' When they depart, they will take their gifts and secrets with them. This may be your only chance to hear what they have to offer."

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉，舰长大人，但如果您不打算见那些教派成员一面的话，他们就会重新回到底层甲板的秘密藏身处。根据他们的说法，他们的教派必须得回到甲板上，‘再次为不死之神服务，在黑暗中重归神圣之路’。如果他们离开，他们恐怕会把他们的礼物与秘密一起带走。如果您打算看看他们有什么东西要献给您，这恐怕就是最后的机会了。”

languages.text: 「申し訳ございません、ロード・キャプテン。魔女団が謁見を許されなければ、彼らはフラッグシップの下層ベイでの秘密に戻るだろう。彼らによると、教団は不死身の皇帝に仕え、暗闇の中の聖なる道を歩むべきだ。彼らの出発の時、贈り物と秘密を持っていくだろう。今回は彼らが何を提供できるのか聞くには最後のチャンスかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain, but if the cultists are not granted an audience, they will go back to their secretive existence in the flagship's lower bays. According to them, 'the cult must return to the service of the Undying Emperor and tread the sacred path in darkness.' When they depart, they will take their gifts and secrets with them. This may be your only chance to hear what they have to offer."

traits.locale_text: 「申し訳ございません、ロード・キャプテン。魔女団が謁見を許されなければ、彼らはフラッグシップの下層ベイでの秘密に戻るだろう。彼らによると、教団は不死身の皇帝に仕え、暗闇の中の聖なる道を歩むべきだ。彼らの出発の時、贈り物と秘密を持っていくだろう。今回は彼らが何を提供できるのか聞くには最後のチャンスかもしれない」

languages.text: "Verzeiht, Lord Captain, doch wenn den Kultisten keine Audienz gewährt wird, dann führen sie in Zukunft wieder ihr geheimes Dasein in den unteren Modulen des Flaggschiffs. Sie sagen, Zitat: 'Der Kult muss in den Dienst des Todlosen Imperators zurückkehren und den heiligen Pfad in Dunkelheit beschreiten.' Wenn sie gehen, nehmen sie ihre Geschenke und ihre Geheimnisse mit. Das könnte Eure einzige Chance sein, zu hören, was sie anzubieten haben."
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain, but if the cultists are not granted an audience, they will go back to their secretive existence in the flagship's lower bays. According to them, 'the cult must return to the service of the Undying Emperor and tread the sacred path in darkness.' When they depart, they will take their gifts and secrets with them. This may be your only chance to hear what they have to offer."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht, Lord Captain, doch wenn den Kultisten keine Audienz gewährt wird, dann führen sie in Zukunft wieder ihr geheimes Dasein in den unteren Modulen des Flaggschiffs. Wenn sie gehen, nehmen sie ihre Geschenke und ihre Geheimnisse mit. Das könnte Eure einzige Chance sein, zu hören, was sie anzubieten haben."

languages.text: "Kusuruma bakmayın Lord Kaptan ama tarikatçılar, görüşme talepleri yerine getirilmediği durumda sancak gemisinin alt güvertelerindeki gizemli yaşamlarına geri dönecek. Onlara göre 'tarikatın Ölmeyen İmparator'un hizmetine geri dönüp kutsal yolu karanlıkta katetmesi' gerekiyormuş. Ayrıldıklarında beraberlerindeki hediyeleri ve sırları da götürecekler. Sunacakları teklifi dinlemek için bu son şansınız olabilir."
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain, but if the cultists are not granted an audience, they will go back to their secretive existence in the flagship's lower bays. According to them, 'the cult must return to the service of the Undying Emperor and tread the sacred path in darkness.' When they depart, they will take their gifts and secrets with them. This may be your only chance to hear what they have to offer."
